title: FUTURE WORLD (1976)
description:
================================================================================
Directed by Richard T. Heffron. With Peter Fonda, Blythe Danner, Arthur Hill
Futureworld (1976)
================================================================================
DVDrip/dvix/no subtitles/english audio.
================================================================================
Futureworld - where you can&#039;t tell the robots from the machines - even when you look in the mirror!
Where "Westworld" Stopped "Futureworld" Begins! Offering fantasy, sensuality and adventure complete satisfaction guaranteed. Entry Fee: $1,200 Per Day. Exit Fee: Your Life!
Is this you...or are You you?
================================================================================
Sequel to Westworld. It has been a couple of years since the disaster at the Delos resort (events of "Westworld") and Delos is ready to reopen - with new world "Futureworld" replacing Westworld which is getting rave reviews. However one of Delos&#039;s most famous critics - reporter Chuck Browning - is still unconvinced, especially after a possible informant about a possible new story about Delos is murdered. Deciding to investigate, Chuck goes to Delos and teams up with fellow reporter Tracy Ballard to find out why his source died. What they discover is beyond any of their imaginations.  Written by Lee Horton {<a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="82cee7e7eac2f6e1f2ace1edacf7e9">[email&#160;protected]</a><script data-cfhash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
